site.description: RiseClipse is an umbrella name for tools based on Model Driven Engineering (MDE) technologies and dedicated to IEC standards. These tools are developed in the context of RISEGrid and used within or based on Eclipse or its plugins.

category-def.name: RiseClipseSCLEditor
category-def.label: RiseClipse
category-def.description: RiseClipse Editor with metamodel for IEC 61850-6 SCL language Edition 2

category-def.name: RiseClipseEditor
category-def.label: RiseClipse Editor
category-def.description: Specific RiseClipse Editor (based on generic EMF editor)

category-def.name: RiseClipseSCL
category-def.label: RiseClipse SCL support
category-def.description: RiseClipse metamodel for IEC 61850-6 SCL language Edition 2
